channel.title: CVE Feed for The Eclipse Foundation -- Eclipse Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Eclipse Foundation -- Eclipse Platform

item.title: CVE-2020-27225|2024-08-04T16:11:36.031Z -- the%20eclipse%20foundation -- eclipse%20platform
item.description: In versions 4.18 and earlier of the Eclipse Platform, the Help Subsystem does not authenticate active help requests to the local help web server, allowing an unauthenticated local attacker to issue active help commands to the associated Eclipse Platform process or Eclipse Rich Client Platform process.
